Guarded Land.name: Guarded Land
Guarded Land.fullText:
Guardian of the Land Feature Guarded Land

The land’s spirits awaken, answering your plea for aid.

Encounter        Primal, Zone
Minor Action      Close blast 3

Effect: You mark each enemy in the blast until the end of your next turn. The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter, or until a creature uses arcane defiling within the zone. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. You can move the zone 1 square as part of a move action, or 3 squares as a move action.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 60.
Guarded Land.flavor: The land’s spirits awaken, answering your plea for aid.
Guarded Land.effect: You mark each enemy in the blast until the end of your next turn. The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter, or until a creature uses arcane defiling within the zone. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. You can move the zone 1 square as part of a move action, or 3 squares as a move action.

Land's Rebuke.name: Land's Rebuke
Land's Rebuke.fullText:
Guardian of the Land Attack 11Land's Rebuke

The land is your ally, and at your call it rises up to smash your enemies.

Encounter        Primal
Immediate Interrupt      Area special

Trigger: An enemy within the zone created by your guarded land and marked by you makes an attack that does not include you as a target.

Target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land

Attack: Primary ability + 6 (9 at 21st level) vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d10 + ability modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 60.
Land's Rebuke.flavor: The land is your ally, and at your call it rises up to smash your enemies.
Land's Rebuke.trigger: An enemy within the zone created by your guarded land and marked by you makes an attack that does not include you as a target.
Land's Rebuke.target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land
Land's Rebuke.attack: Primary ability + 6 (9 at 21st level) vs. Fortitude
Land's Rebuke.onHit: 2d10 + ability modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.

Awakened Fury.name: Awakened Fury
Awakened Fury.fullText:
Guardian of the Land Attack 20Awakened Fury

The land stirs to violence, snatching and rending your enemies.

Daily        Primal
Standard Action      Area special

Target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land

Attack: Primary ability + 9 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + ability modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 60.
Awakened Fury.flavor: The land stirs to violence, snatching and rending your enemies.
Awakened Fury.target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land
Awakened Fury.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Awakened Fury.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Land Stride.name: Land Stride
Land Stride.fullText:
Guardian of the Land Utility 12Land Stride

While on or near the lands you guard, nothing can hold you.

At-Will        Primal, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Requirement: You are within the zone created by guarded land or adjacent to it.

Effect: You teleport 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 60.
Land Stride.flavor: While on or near the lands you guard, nothing can hold you.
Land Stride.requirement: You are within the zone created by guarded land or adjacent to it.
Land Stride.effect: You teleport 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.
